titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Toxic Control Act relating to asbestos in the Nation's schools by extending the deadlines for local educational agencies to submit asbestos management plans to State Governors and to begin implementation of those plans and by requiring a sufficient number accredited contractors and laboratories.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 4/27/1988--Introduced. Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act to extend the deadlines by which local educational agencies must inspect school buildings for friable asbestos-containing materials, develop and implement operation and maintenance and management plans for such materials, and obtain State approval of such management plans. Directs the Environmental Protection Agency to ensure that there are a sufficient number of accredited contractors and laboratories to conduct school asbestos inspection, management, and evaluation activities.
